text: Lɨhavɨdaci Asɨ dɨ ciaŋ hali hɨsɨŋ akape agɨlaŋ nudɨ mɨgahɨnihɨni hɨsɨŋ uvɨ agadɨdaŋ hulaŋ hekɨlɨ hekɨlɨ 24 agɨladɨdaŋ haŋala hudavɨla hɨniavi uami. Akuaba akuaba limu ahica limu ahica hɨhi hɨniavɨlalɨ agɨladɨ avi haŋala hudavɨla hɨniavi uami. Haŋala huda hɨnihɨni fɨli hɨvɨ sɨkasɨkan mɨgavɨla ipalavɨci mɨguavɨci ani valɨ hɨnihɨni Asɨ dɨ ibi mɨŋaiahavi uami.
